EmailTemplate.name: [Video] NCR SelfServ 80 Series ATM
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR SelfServ 80 Series ATM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
I thought you might enjoy this terrific new video about NCR’s SelfServ 80 Series ATM family and the impact it’s having on customer experience. Let me know what you think or if you have any questions.
NCR SelfServ 80 Series ATM Family - A New Era for ATMs
Revolutionary to the ATM industry, the NCR SelfServ 80 Series captures the attention of consumers and enables you to highlight your branches unique personality.
The modern look and feel, inspired by design cues from the consumer electronic technology market, ensures you are investing in the most cutting-edge technology to deliver an enhanced consumer experience.
I hope you enjoyed the video. Thanks for watching!
Martin Lopez
Sales Development Executive – Financial Services NCR Corporation, World Headquarters Duluth GA USA office: 678.808.7917 | mobile: 425-200-5654 martin.lopez@ncr.com |
www.ncr.com
P.S. I am available to provide more information.
